类的使用
structure.Point

使用Point的程序包 
程序包 说明
chess  
structure  

  • chess中Point的使用

    返回变量类型为Point的类型的chess中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static java.util.ArrayList<Point> Chess.findPath​(Point p1, Point p2)
    The method is going to find a path from p1 to p2.
    参数类型为Point的chess中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static java.util.ArrayList<Point> Chess.findPath​(Point p1, Point p2)
    The method is going to find a path from p1 to p2.
    static Cell Chess.getCell​(Point p)
    This method is going to Convert a Point to a Cell
    static boolean Chess.isStalemate​(Point kLoc)
    This method can judge if the piece in the point kLoc have possible movement in the next step

  • structure中Point的使用

    返回Point的structure中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static Point Point.getLocation​(java.lang.String pieceName)
    This method is going to return the location based on the piece's name.
    返回变量类型为Point的类型的structure中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.util.ArrayList<Point> Bishop.Searcher()
    This method is going to search all of the possible location where the Bishop can reach.
    abstract java.util.ArrayList<Point> Cell.Searcher()
    The abstract Searcher method which should be override by subclass.
    java.util.ArrayList<Point> Empty.Searcher()
    This method is going to search all of the possible location where the Empty can reach.
    java.util.ArrayList<Point> King.Searcher()  
    java.util.ArrayList<Point> Knight.Searcher()
    This method is going to search all of the possible location where the Knight can reach.
    java.util.ArrayList<Point> Pawn.Searcher()
    This method is going to search all of the possible location where the Pawn can reach.
    java.util.ArrayList<Point> Queen.Searcher()
    This method is going to search all of the possible location where the Queen can reach.
    java.util.ArrayList<Point> Rook.Searcher()
    This method is going to search all of the possible location where the Rook can reach.
    参数类型为Point的structure中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static boolean Point.check​(Point kLoc, Point kLoc2)
    This method is used to decide whether a piece is under attack.
    static boolean Point.checkFromSelf​(Point kLoc, Point kLoc2)
    This method is going to figure out whether a piece from my side which can reach a specific location, exists.
    static Cell Point.findCheck​(Point kLoc)
    This method is going to return which enemy piece is checking on my King.
    static boolean Point.isEnemy​(Point p1, Point p2)
    Decide whether two Points on the board are enemies.
    static Cell Point.PointThreatFromPN​(Point kLoc)
    This function help us to know if the Point kLoc be threatened by enemy pawn
    static Cell Point.PointTreatFromKN​(Point kLoc)
    This function help us to know if the Point kLoc be threatened by enemy Knight
    static boolean Point.threatFromPorN​(Point kLoc, Point kLoc2)
    Check whether kLoc is under attack from a Knight or a Pawn
    static boolean Point.threatFromPorNSelf​(Point kLoc, Point kLoc2)
    This function can help us know if the piece at kLoc can be threatened by own Pawn/Knight
